text: Ano kabe wa machi no 2-ri no osananai minashigo no mono de, sono-ka ni wa, kare-ra ni kizoku suru zaihō ga umete ari, chichioya wa tadashī jinbutsudeatta. Sorede omo wa, kare-ra ga seinen ni tasshite kara, sono zaihō o kare-ra ryōnin no tame ni horidasu koto o nozoma reta. (Koreha)-nushi kara no onmegumidearu. Watashi ga katte ni itta kotode wa nakatta noda. Kore ga anata no tae rarenakatta koto no setsumeidearu
